list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add MariaDB data source configuration
This commit introduces a new XML file configuring a MariaDB data source in the .idea directory. The file includes grants for various database permissions and collations for multiple character sets. This setup will facilitate database management and operations within the development environment.

MESSAGE.value:
Add unit tests for RowsToJson function
Implemented a new test case in sql2json_test.go to validate the RowsToJson function using sqlmock. Adjusted RowsToJson function in sql2json.go to handle nil rows check properly before initializing the result slice.

Delete obsolete database configuration files
Removed outdated database configuration files for MARIADB from the project. This cleanup helps prevent confusion and potential misconfiguration in future updates.

Add new MariaDB data source configurations
Introduced new database configuration files for MariaDB to the project. This includes the data source, SQL dialect mappings, and local storage settings, optimizing connectivity and compatibility for development.

Add MariaDB data source configuration
This commit introduces a new XML file configuring a MariaDB data source in the .idea directory. The file includes grants for various database permissions and collations for multiple character sets. This setup will facilitate database management and operations within the development environment.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:

This commit introduces a new XML file configuring a MariaDB data source in the .idea directory. The file includes grants for various database permissions and collations for multiple character sets. This setup will facilitate database management and operations within the development environment.
